name: DNFlyingBadges
summary: DNFlyingBadges is an easy to use and fun control for quick contextual user notification.
description: DNFlyingBadges is an easy to use and fun control for quick contextual user notification. Rather than the traditional loading or alert that often covers the view and requires user interaction DNFlyingBadges are quick and contextually relevant indicators that can be customized for a variety of situations using a single library.
